title: Lullaby of Leaves
description: Fran had been assured that it would be all right for her and the group of children in her care to stay at Brocade, a lovely old mansion in the heart of the Cotswolds.They would only be there for a few weeks until they had found new quarters. But what would happen if the rightful owner of Brocade arrived home unexpectedly?
author: Janice Gray
